attributes.action: A referendum for Perth and Kinross to become independent
attributes.additional_details: I believe that the region of Perth and Kinross should be allowed to decide to be a part of the UK or part of an independent Scotland if Scotland leaves the UK.
attributes.background: If Scotland votes to leave the UK the region of Perth and Kinross should be allowed to decide to remain part of an independent Scotland or remain part of the UK

rejection.details:
A number of attempts have been made to start petitions making requests similar to this petition, using what appear to be fake names and email addresses.

We can only consider a petition if the creator has started it using their full, legal name, so if you would like to proceed with your petition please can you contact us at petitionscommittee@parliament.uk so we can verify your identity.
